ygData.subject: Re: Erollosi Marr?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Going from level 4 to level 5 is extremely fast and easy.  Just run around the newbie area singing the level 2 song, and the wimp monsters will flock to
ygData.messageBody:
>Yes, I'm Weiland. Level 4 from Queynos. Just started 3 days ago. Any
>suggestion on how to level up quicker?

Going from level 4 to level 5 is extremely fast and easy. Just run around
the newbie area singing the level 2 song, and the wimp monsters will flock
to you as fast as you can bash them. (But be careful to stay far away from
guards and merchants! Just about every bard has been accidentally killed
by singing one of the area effect spells too close to a NPC.)

- Windsong Wanderer, bard on Solusek Ro
